doc.title: FALN
doc.plot: Cinematography by members of the FALN. This is a straightforward account of the birth of the revolutionary Venezuelan organization FALN (Fuerzas Armadas de Liberaci√≥n). It traces the history of social and political unrest in Venezuela, which was aggravated by the interventionist policies of the United States and which led to a split in relations between peasants and the forces in power.
